#Wipro - 11% (vs 15.7%) - Lowest since FY2018. Highest Quarterly net addition (5065) for current FY2021. Like TCS, Wipro also typically has high net additions in Q2, which has moved to Q3 this FY2021. Q2 and Q3 this year have retained the same attrition %.

#TCS - 7.6% (vs 12.2%) - Lowest since FY2018. Also, the highest Quarterly net addition (15721) since FY2018. Typically TCS has Q2 as their highest net addition quarter, which moved to Q3 this FY2021. High net addition and low attrition go hand in hand for TCS.
